${ModID}:ScatterNails.NAME: Scatter Nails
${ModID}:ScatterNails.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL At the start of their turn, they lose !M! HP.

${ModID}:Whirl.NAME: Whirl
${ModID}:Whirl.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies twice. NL ${ModID}:Spin !${ModID}:s!: Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}.

${ModID}:TwistingStrike.NAME: Twisting Strike
${ModID}:TwistingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Put a card from your discard pile into your hand.

${ModID}:LetRip.NAME: Let 'er Rip
${ModID}:LetRip.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}. NL Discard !M! card{!M!|>1=s}.

${ModID}:LostCog.NAME: Lost Cog
${ModID}:LostCog.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the last card you played this combat ${ModID}:Spun, deal !D! damage again.

${ModID}:Blurrier.NAME: Blurrier
${ModID}:Blurrier.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL ${ModID}:Spin !${ModID}:s!: Gain !B! Block again.

${ModID}:BoostedBlow.NAME: Boosted Blow
${ModID}:BoostedBlow.DESCRIPTION: {@@}${ModID}:Let_Go: Deal damage equal to !M! times ${ModID}:Charge spent.{!Location!|0= NL (Deals !D! damage.)}

${ModID}:ExtendoGrip.NAME: Extendo Grip
${ModID}:ExtendoGrip.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL ${ModID}:Wind_Up !M!.

${ModID}:Synchronise.NAME: Synchronise
${ModID}:Synchronise.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Attune an Attack or Skill. NL ${ModID}:Spin !${ModID}:s!: Add a copy of it into your hand. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Choose an Attack or Skill to Attune.

${ModID}:Gyroscope.NAME: Gyroscope
${ModID}:Gyroscope.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable ${ModID}:Part: NL ${ModID}:Spin !${ModID}:s! to deal !${ModID}:m2! damage to a random enemy and Retain this.

${ModID}:Advance.NAME: Advance
${ModID}:Advance.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}. NL ${ModID}:Spin !${ModID}:s!: Gain {!${ModID}:m2!|1=[E]|2=[E] [E]|3=[E] [E] [E]|@=!${ModID}:m2! [E]} and add a copy of this card into your hand with !${ModID}:m3! extra ${ModID}:Spin cost. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Inertia.NAME: Inertia
${ModID}:Inertia.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you ${ModID}:Wind_Up, you have !M! additional Strength until you next ${ModID}:Spin. NL ${ModID}:Wind_Up !${ModID}:m2!.

${ModID}:DangerousDeterrent.NAME: Dangerous Deterrent
${ModID}:DangerousDeterrent.DESCRIPTION: Lose !${ModID}:m2! HP. NL Add !M! *Sawblades into your hand. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Spinner.NAME: Sawblade
${ModID}:Spinner.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable ${ModID}:Part: NL Deal !${ModID}:m2! damage to ALL enemies and increase this damage by !M!.

${ModID}:GatherParts.NAME: Gather Parts
${ModID}:GatherParts.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, heal !M! HP and Exhaust.

${ModID}:Accelerate.NAME: Accelerate
${ModID}:Accelerate.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}. NL ${ModID}:Spin !${ModID}:s!: Add a *Sawblade into your hand.

${ModID}:FlyingCogs.NAME: Flying Cogs
${ModID}:FlyingCogs.DESCRIPTION: Activate and discard all ${ModID}:Parts in your hand. NL Deal !D! damage and draw a card for each card discarded.

${ModID}:Rewinder.NAME: Rewinder
${ModID}:Rewinder.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Unplayable ${ModID}:Part: NL ${ModID}:Spin !${ModID}:s! to Retain another card.

${ModID}:Efficiency.NAME: Efficiency
${ModID}:Efficiency.DESCRIPTION: When ${ModID}:Parts are activated, activate them an additional time.

${ModID}:AsFarAsItGoes.NAME: As Far as it Goes
${ModID}:AsFarAsItGoes.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Shuffle any number of cards from your discard pile into your draw pile.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Select any number of cards to shuffle into your draw pile.

${ModID}:Reassemble.NAME: Reassemble
${ModID}:Reassemble.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Put ALL ${ModID}:Parts from your {!Upgrades!|@=|>0=draw and }discard pile into your hand.

${ModID}:RotationalChaos.NAME: Rotational Chaos
${ModID}:RotationalChaos.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Add a *Sawblade into your hand. NL ${ModID}:Spin !${ModID}:s!: Play the top !M! card{!M!|>1=s} of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Mesmerise.NAME: Mesmerise
${ModID}:Mesmerise.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak and !${ModID}:m2! ${ModID}:Dizzy to ALL enemies. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:ShinyCog.NAME: Shiny Cog
${ModID}:ShinyCog.DESCRIPTION: If you have played a *Ghostly *Cog this combat, gain !M! Gold. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:GhostlyCog.NAME: Ghostly Cog
${ModID}:GhostlyCog.DESCRIPTION: If you have played a *Shiny *Cog this combat, gain !M! Intangible. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Acog.NAME: ACOG
${ModID}:Acog.DESCRIPTION: {@@}{!Upgrades!|@=If the enemy intends to attack, your|>0=Your} next attack deals double damage.

${ModID}:ManyMovements.NAME: Many Movements
${ModID}:ManyMovements.DESCRIPTION: {@@}${ModID}:Spin !${ModID}:s! for each: NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Draw !${ModID}:m2! card{!${ModID}:m2!|>1=s}.

${ModID}:Tip.NAME: Tip
${ModID}:Tip.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${ModID}:Spin !${ModID}:s!: Enemy loses !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:WearAndTear.NAME: Wear and Tear
${ModID}:WearAndTear.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !${ModID}:m2! times. NL Exhaust. NL ${ModID}:Part: Gain !M! Strength.

${ModID}:RecursionMechanism.NAME: Cog Surge
${ModID}:RecursionMechanism.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${ModID}:Spin !${ModID}:s!: Gain !M! Artifact. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:PeepTheHaul.NAME: Peep the Haul!
${ModID}:PeepTheHaul.DESCRIPTION: {@@}{!Upgrades!|@=At|>0=Now and at} the end of your turn, shuffle !M! random ${ModID}:Trinket{!M!|>1=s} into your draw pile.

${ModID}:PerpetualForm.NAME: Perpetual Form
${ModID}:PerpetualForm.DESCRIPTION: {@@}At the start of your turn, lose {!${ModID}:m2!|1=[E]|2=[E] [E]|3=[E] [E] [E]|@=!${ModID}:m2! [E]}. NL Gain !M! ${ModID}:Cogwheels. Cards can now be played with ${ModID}:Charge ( !${ModID}:m3! ${ModID}:Charge per [E] ).

${ModID}:MachinicModification.NAME: Machinic Modification
${ModID}:MachinicModification.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card. Permanently give it ${ModID}:Wind_Up !M!. NL Fleeting.

${ModID}:Rearrange.NAME: Tinker
${ModID}:Rearrange.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL ${ModID}:Attune all cards in your hand for the rest of combat.

${ModID}:Teddy.NAME: Teddy Bear
${ModID}:Teddy.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Can be ${ModID}:Attuned at Rest Sites any number of times.

${ModID}:SwiftStomps.NAME: Swift Stomps
${ModID}:SwiftStomps.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${ModID}:Spin !${ModID}:s!: Deal !D! damage. NL ${ModID}:Spin !${ModID}:s!: Deal !D! damage.

${ModID}:UnleashRage.NAME: Unleash Rage
${ModID}:UnleashRage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${ModID}:Part: Next turn, gain !M! temporary Strength.

${ModID}:RearrangeAttack.NAME: Rearrange
${ModID}:RearrangeAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Swap the positions of a card in your discard pile and a card in your draw pile.

${ModID}:Scanner.NAME: Scanner
${ModID}:Scanner.DESCRIPTION: {@@}After you play a card, ${ModID}:Attune it{!M!|>1= !M! times}.

${ModID}:EmergencyStop.NAME: Emergency Stop
${ModID}:EmergencyStop.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Cannot bring enemies below !M! HP. NL End your turn.

${ModID}:PreciseTuning.NAME: Precise Tuning
${ModID}:PreciseTuning.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}. NL Discard all cards drawn this way that aren't ${ModID}:Attuned.

${ModID}:WormGear.NAME: Worm Gear
${ModID}:WormGear.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Draw 1 card. If it's a ${ModID}:Part, activate it{!M!|@=|>1= !M! times} and repeat this, otherwise discard it.

${ModID}:Futureproofing.NAME: Futureproofing
${ModID}:Futureproofing.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}. NL ${ModID}:Part: Draw !${ModID}:m2! card{!${ModID}:m2!|>1=s} and Retain them.

${ModID}:Salvage.NAME: Salvage
${ModID}:Salvage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${ModID}:Equip a random Tool.

${ModID}:Resonance.NAME: Resonance
${ModID}:Resonance.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL ${ModID}:Spin !${ModID}:s!. NL If you've already played this card at least !M! times, gain !B! Block.

${ModID}:GearRatio.NAME: Fool Me Twice
${ModID}:GearRatio.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage !M! time{!M!|>1=s}. NL ${ModID}:Spin !${ModID}:s!: Increase this card's hits by !${ModID}:m2! this combat.

${ModID}:Toolerang.NAME: Toolerang
${ModID}:Toolerang.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${ModID}:Attune this card !M! times.

${ModID}:KineticServo.NAME: Kinetic Servo
${ModID}:KineticServo.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you are attacked this turn, ${ModID}:Wind_Up !M!.

${ModID}:PitchPoint.NAME: Pitch Point
${ModID}:PitchPoint.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${ModID}:Wind_Up !M!. NL Whenever you ${ModID}:Spin, return this from the discard pile to your hand.

${ModID}:Masterwork.NAME: Masterwork
${ModID}:Masterwork.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Spin !${ModID}:s!: ${ModID}:Attune your hand, draw pile, and discard pile.

${ModID}:VexingGlare.NAME: Vexing Glare
${ModID}:VexingGlare.DESCRIPTION: Whenever ${ModID}:Parts are activated, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:DiligentWork.NAME: Diligent Work
${ModID}:DiligentWork.DESCRIPTION: {@@}At the start of your turn, ${ModID}:Actuate X{!M!|>1=+!M!|<0=!M!} times.

${ModID}:BouncyBall.NAME: Bouncy Ball
${ModID}:BouncyBall.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Trinket. NL ${ModID}:Part: Deal !M! damage to a random enemy.
